colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013B (ZHES GSUNGS SO, ,BEE DKAR DANG KHYUNG GI GSHIN PO'I RTZIS LAS BYA SLA BA TSEGS CHUNG DU SGRUB NUS BCOS THABS SOGS BSNAN TE GSHIN RTZIS BSDUS PA GSER GYI THUR MA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, MKHAN CHEN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BKA' DRIN GYIS NYE TSE BKA' 'BANGS RNAMS KYI THA SHAL NYON BRAN LO TZTSA BA LUNG RIG PA DAG GIS BSGRIGS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG SEMS CAN THAMS CAD BRAL BA'I GDUR BA RNAMS KYI SDUG BSNGAL RGYUN CHAD NAS RTAG TU DGA' BA'I SEMS DANG LDAN PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,)
